metadata.title: Comparative characteristics of bottom ichthyocenes of continental slope areas off the western Bering Sea, the Northern Kuril Island and Southern Kamchatka

creators.name: Fisheries, Russian Federal Research Institute of

metadata.description: The comparative analysis of taxonomic biodiversity of bottom ichthyocenes, distribution and abundance of some commercially important groundfishes on continental slope off the Western Bering Sea (WBS) and northern Kuril Islands and Southeastern Kamchatka (NKSEK) was made.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: A report on the comparative characteristics of bottom ichthyocenes of continental slope areas off the western Bering Sea, the Northern Kuril Island and Southern Kamchatka
